comments.body: Remove the `@ga.computed` decorator from lines 44 and 54. Neither of these getters need to be cached with a computed, because they're very cheap to compute. See related documentation: [Deciding what should be a Computed](https://www.notion.so/gathertown/MobX-Gather-160bc7eac3d180bbab49eb3082224676?#169bc7eac3d180feb941c4e13789a051)
